thread.section_title: Servicing Stop Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.servicingstop.co.uk | 27 of 390
thread.title: MA

author: MA
title: MA
text:
Would def recommend.
I initially booked for one date, and had to rearrange by phoning the customer service line. All very easy and no problems.
Then, as arranged the guy came to collect my car. He was very polite and even slightly early.
My car received an MOT and passed completely. Therefore didn't have to pay for anything extra and demonstrates they aren't going to make up a Quote: to try to get more money.
The same guy then dropped my car back, in the stated time frame. Again he was very polite and I couldn't rate him highly enough.
Thank you so much. Would def recommend to others. Great value and great service.
